name: Invader: Corrupted Drive
description:
One technician, Decided to use his DVD drive as a coffee cup holder. after a nasty accident the contents of that coffee made its way into the computer, damaging a recklessly exposed Disk Drive.

Meet Knighty and Dragon, 2 normal characters in a perfectly normal game. little did they know that coffee was coming. segments of the drive have become horrendously corrupted, you must figure out a way to jump to the other drive  without being corrupted yourself! dodge those errors being spat out by those rogue programs!
